alert.note: Alert for Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:30PM CDT until May 12 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SHAWNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 729 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoyt, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holton, Hoyt, Mayetta, Denison, Circleville and Potawatomi Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
